---
title: "Shih Ching Fu _BSc(Hons) MSc GStat_"
---

Shih Ching is an research statistician based in Perth, Western Australia. With backgrounds in Computer Science and Applied Statistics, Shih Ching enjoys the computational side of problem solving and introducing people to the loveliness of [R](https://cran.r-project.org/).

Shih Ching has previously been a researcher in mineral exploration, a product owner at a software startup, a biostatistical consultant at a university, and worked with data from astronomy, law enforcement, defence, agriculture, and health care.
